name: Chapter 1: The Portal
short_description: Sarah stumbles upon an ancient artifact in an abandoned building, and upon touching it, she is teleported to a parallel world.
to_next_chapter: Sarah begins to explore her surroundings.

beats.long_title: Meet Sarah Davis, a modern-day engineer
beats.description: Introduce Sarah Davis, highlighting her background as a talented engineer. Show her at work, solving a technical problem, and revealing her innovative spirit.
Sarah, while exploring a neglected part of the city, finds an old, abandoned building that piques her curiosity. She decides to investigate further.

Inside the abandoned building, Sarah stumbles upon a hidden room filled with strange and ancient artifacts. One artifact, in particular, catches her eye due to its intricate design and mysterious aura.
As Sarah examines the artifact closely, she accidentally activates it by pressing a hidden switch. Glowing lights and arcane symbols begin to appear around the artifact.
The artifact generates a swirling portal right in front of Sarah. She's both fascinated and terrified by the unexpected phenomenon, contemplating whether to step through.
Driven by curiosity and adventure, Sarah decides to step through the portal. Instantly, she is engulfed in a vortex of light and sound, losing her sense of direction.

beats.long_title: Sarah Arrives in a Strange New World
beats.description: Sarah finds herself in the outskirts of an unfamiliar world, vastly different from Earth. The environment is imbued with a magical essence, leaving Sarah in awe and confusion.
Sarah begins to explore her immediate surroundings, taking in the strange flora and fauna. She notes the blend of medieval and magical elements around her.

beats.long_title: Sarah Looks for Clues about Her Whereabouts
beats.description: Sarah starts searching for any signs of civilization or anything that might give her clues about where she is and how she might return home.
As Sarah gathers her courage and plans her next steps, she resolves to move further into this mysterious new world, setting the stage for her next chapter of exploration and discovery.
